A Study of Global COVID-19 Situation aims to provide tables, plots and related analysis regarding the COVID-19 situation and vaccination status in multiple countries around the world.

Tables, plots and data description can be found in posts and/or related sections on navigation bar.

Dataset used for creating the tables, plots and posts was retrieved from [Our World in Data](https://ourworldindata.org/coronavirus/country/chile) on 1 September 2021, data contained is updated from February 2020 to 31 August 2021.

Detailed data description and source citation can be found in [Data Description](https://etc5523-2021.github.io/blog-xwan0274/posts/2021-09-01-data-description/).
